revised_title: Quantum Theory of Lattice Dynamics: Fourth Paper
tldr: This article explores the expansion of the total electron energy in a crystal based on nuclear displacements from the equilibrium configuration. The authors derive expressions for the electronic contributions to the force-constant tensors in real space and show that the effective nuclear potential has a simple two-body form for a Bravais lattice. The results are applicable to the Hartree-Fock approximation and demonstrate translational invariance to all orders.
